alert.note: Alert for Lonoke; Pulaski (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 27 at 2:51PM CDT until July 27 at 3:15PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 315 PM CDT FOR WEST CENTRAL LONOKE AND EAST CENTRAL PULASKI COUNTIES... At 251 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over McAlmont, or near Sherwood, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Little Rock... North Little Rock... Sherwood... Jacksonville... Downtown Little Rock... North Little Rock Airport... Wrightsville... Argenta... Meto... Protho Junction... Sweet Home... Lakewood... Levy... McAlmont... South Bend... Scott... Camp Robinson... Sylvan Hills... Gravel Ridge... Amboy... This includes the following highways... Interstate 30 between mile markers 141 and 142. Interstate 40 between mile markers 153 and 170. Interstate 440 between mile markers 2 and 14. US Highway 67 between mile markers 1 and 10. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
